version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Potatoes added keyboard handling mouse wheel for precise motion added optional input/output clipping improved kr0g filters black background for threshold slider) removed secondary slider range for sliders which do not support it added retina scaling added 5 more filters widened combobox added RMS mode for dynamics fixed minor issues added wasp filter attempt 3 fix for LFO (disabled when turned off) presets added pregain automation attempt 2 added a bunch of FM filters and sine wave distortion added attack and decay multiplier options improved usability (bigger sliders

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.name: 1.48b
version.changelog: 51b Temporary revert from 1

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added 5 more filters Removed secondary slider range for sliders which do not support it Fixed threshold going out of bounds Perf improvements wasp Additional filter to chain (note that you may have to turn this off in some of your presets if you've been using the FIR filter)! Fixed mouse wheel behaviour Add minimum oversampling for filters that need it Hotfix LFO Extra optimization wasp Improved usability (bigger sliders Fix pdc_delay Fix for RMS detection Fontsize fix for mac (hopefully) Aadded filter frequency in Hz where sensible Made gui sizing / hide persistent Added attack and decay multiplier options Added retina scaling Bugfix diode ladder (now stable) Bugfix filter selection Initialize spline immediately to avoid flicker Added FIR option for up/downsampling Fix issue with RMS acquiring DC and not losing it Added wasp filter Widened combobox Added optional input/output clipping Enhanced stability saike's waveshaped filters (feedback clipper) Included presets Fixed incorrect spline loading behavior Fixed bug in MIDI LFO reset Attempted to automate retina support Added option to change modulation amount Fixed update bug Added pregain automation Potatoes Added logo Added cutoff/reso interpolation Added keyboard handling Major bugfix extrapolation Added RMS mode for dynamics Added visualization of dynamics of the shaper when activated to make this more clear Made default tooltip wait time a bit longer and added a toggle to turn them off (T key) Added scaling for non windows machines Fix rms clipping behavior Display modulation range (to avoid confusion) Added FM filters and sine wave distortion Bugfix modulation Improved kr0g filters Bugfix refreshing of dynamic mode labels Fix thresh jitter Added usage hints Fixed issue with filters modes leaking output to eachother when switching Improved some hint descriptions More rigorous buffer clearing Huge refactor of the codebase Added a few comb filters Fix for LFO (disabled when turned off) Minor tweaks Increase scale when double clicking logo Fixed minor issues

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Hotfix for gain issue before UI is opened

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Made sure that change parameter actually reflects what's being changed in case of sliders with 'dynamics' slider

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added option for centered LFOs

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added dbl rightclick for setting dynamic variable to zero

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Change size to accomodate additional block Added adaptive inertia option Added higher multiplier options Minor optimizations

version.changelog: Forgot to hide slider again X_X

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added a few more ms-20 models (better saturation model) Derivative fix ms-20

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Shrunk cutoff range 'expensive moog' Attempt to stabilize waveshaped filters Modified "expensive" moog quite a bit to make it more stable Sorry about the changes Fixed bad scaling issue in the SSM filter and new Kr0g versions let me know If anyone needs the old one back Handwavily optimized BP version of WASP

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Force refresh when filter changed Stabilized Phaser 1

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added velocity sensitive MIDI mode

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Added inverse link for input/output gain Fixed issue with modulation not resetting at proper points when using lookahead feature

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Optimized cem Added ability to activate dynamics and lfo for specific filters separately Added a few afterimage lines to the plot

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Move spline memory to location where it is less likely to get clobbered if there is an initialization issue Added dbl rightcl ick for setting dynamic variable to zero Make sure that nodes actually have to be clicked to be selected Display cutoff (when available for that filter) on second filter as well Removed no_denorm to hopefully prevent CPU spikes Properly initialize reso Bugfix combobox Increase size tooltips midi and cutoff memory

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Bugfix LFO random Bugfix hold mechanism MIDI2

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Add ability to automate post gain Add ability to toggle DYN / LFO for them

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Optional keyfollow Minor bugfix for very fast attacks in the dynamics

version.author: Joep Vanlier
version.changelog: Do not recreate spectrum track when it already exists Only add top level channels to avoid adding channels multiple times Added "OFF" option for sonogram/time window Added transparency setting but merely add/remove channels Added solo (doubleclick on a channel)
